short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks foxnews.com and disables links to Fox News from all sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension blocks all access to foxnews.com. Additionally, links to foxnews.com on all other sites are disabled and replaced with the text "[Fox News BLOCKED]".

The extension works in two ways:
1. When attempting to navigate to foxnews.com, the request is blocked before navigation begins  and you will see a "www.foxnews.com is blocked" error message instead.
2. When visiting a website which contains links to foxnews.com, those links are replaced with a dummy link that reads "[Fox News BLOCKED]".


Updates:

Version 1.0.2:
- Badge count fixed to accurately reflect number of links blocked on the current page
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations
